Talk_0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think_00>Candidly, I'm a little worried about this
mission. The new members didn't get
much in the way of training.
I wish <clr:0000>someone with experience fighting
monsters <clr:ffff>was there to help out.
Talk_0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I still have more of the elixir I prepared.<sp:5:0:0>
Please have some if you like.
Talk_0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Oh!<sp:5:1:0> Your pouch is full.<sp:5:0:0> Well, it never
hurts to be prepared.
Talk_0102:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000>Hoz's squad of the monster-control crew<clr:ffff>
is out on a mission nearby.<sp:5:0:0> Be careful
you don't get caught in the crossfire.
Talk_0002_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Oh, hello. <sp:5:0:0>You just passing through?<sp:0:4:0>Squad one of the monster-control crew,
led by <clr:0000>Hoz<clr:ffff>, is about to engage with some
monsters near here.
<sp:3:0:2:0000>If you can't hold your own in a fight,
I'd advise you to stay away.
Talk_0103:
Hoz is taking them to <clr:0000>Fort Hateno<clr:ffff>, which
is <clr:0000>to the east <clr:ffff>along that road.

They're planning to get rid of the
monsters who set up a stronghold there.
Talk_0104:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>I've been helping them out by taking
care of the horses and making elixirs.

Thing is, I was so worried about them
coming back safe and sound that I made
waaay too much.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You want to take some? I'm sure it'll
come in handy during your travels.
Talk_0105:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think_00>The squad's got some experience under
their belts now, but those monsters
they're up against look pretty tough.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I wish someone <clr:0000>with fighting skills <clr:ffff>would
give them a little extra help.
Talk_0101_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_01>Oh! <sp:5:0:0>You're out late. Can't be easy,
traveling in this darkness.
Talk_0201:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think>The monsters we're fighting have seen
a lot of battles. I think it'll be OK, but you
never know.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>It'd be nice if someone <clr:0000>confident in their
monster-fighting abilities <clr:ffff>was there to
help out.
Talk_0101_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_01>Oh, hello! <sp:5:0:0>Crummy weather we're having
today, isn't it?
Talk_0202:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think>We're actually taking back a fort that
used to be ours, so we know the terrain.
That should give us an advantage.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Still, you never know. I wish someone with
<clr:0000>fighting skills <clr:ffff>was there to make sure we
come out on top.
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Oh! <sp:5:0:0>You're <sp:5:0:0>not a member of the monster-
control crew.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01>Sorry. <sp:5:1:0>We just formed, so I'm not overly
familiar with everyone's faces.
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_01>As we speak, squad one of the monster-
control crew—led by <clr:0000>Hoz<clr:ffff>—<sp:5:0:0>is carrying out
a mission nearby.
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>If you <clr:0000>go south on that road<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:1:0> you can
see them in action. They're assaulting a
monster stronghold!
Talk_0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I'm just here for logistical support—
tending to the horses, making elixirs.

Come to think of it...<sp:5:1:0>I did make some
extra elixir. Why don't you take some?
Might come in handy during your travels.
Talk_0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>The monster-control crew was only
created recently, <sp:5:0:0>so a lot of the members
aren't used to fighting monsters.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I'd be more confident if <clr:0000>someone with
fighting experience <clr:ffff>was there to help.
